sentences.en: Bowler Hat Guy : Why arent you seizing the boy?
sentences.cn: “礼帽”盖伊: 你为什么不抓住那个男孩?

sentences.en: Bowler hats are not often worn nowadays.
sentences.cn: 现在戴常礼帽的已不多见了.

sentences.en: He is the bowler-hatted figure in the foreground of Orpen's famous painting.
sentences.cn: 他是奥彭那幅名画中位于前景的戴圆顶硬礼帽的那个人物。

sentences.en: He looked immaculate in his suit and bowler hat.
sentences.cn: 他穿着西装戴着礼貌,看上去挺纯洁的.

sentences.en: He wears a bowler to go to his office.
sentences.cn: 他上班总是戴着一顶黑色硬礼帽.

sentences.en: He's a good batsman but a poor bowler.
sentences.cn: 他击球不错,但投球不太好.

sentences.en: He's joined the bowler - hatted brigade working in the City.
sentences.cn: 他已跻身于那帮戴常礼帽的人的行列,在伦敦商业区工作.

sentences.en: I'd like to have a bowler hat.
I'm like to have a bowler hat.
sentences.cn: 我想买一顶圆顶硬礼帽.

sentences.en: I've had a basinful of bowler - hat and furled - umbrella parts.
sentences.cn: 我老是演戴硬圆顶礼帽和携带雨伞的平民角色,实在是演腻了.

sentences.en: My dad was a pretty decent bowler, usually he converted spares.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸保龄球玩得相当不错, 经常二击全倒.

sentences.en: The ball was thrown back underarm to the bowler.
sentences.cn: 从肩下把球扔回给玩保龄球的人.

sentences.en: The bowler judged it well, timing the ball to perfection.
sentences.cn: 投球手判断准确, 对球速的掌握恰到好处.

sentences.en: The bowler let go a couple of scorchers.
sentences.cn: 投球手投出了几个快球.

sentences.en: The fielders try to retrieve the ball quickly and return it to the bowler.
sentences.cn: 外野手试图迅速接过球传给投球手.

words.tran_cn: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
投球；旋转；平稳快速移动

trans.tran_en: a player in  cricket  who throws the ball at a  batsman
